metadata.publisher: A Paris : De l'Imprimerie du Patriote françois, place tu Thêtre italien, rue Favart, no. 3,
metadata.description: Also published under title: A tous les républicains de france, sur la Société des Jacobins de Paris. Paris : De l'imprimerie du Cercle social, 1792. Cf. Martin & Walter
metadata.notes: Title page located on front cover. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Worn, stained, damaged pages and cover.
